colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,RJE RIN PO CHE SHAR BTZONG KHA PA'I ZHAL GDAMS THUN MONG MIN PA'I ZAB CHOS BLA NA MED PA RJE NYID KYIS GSUNGS PA BZHIN YI GER BKOD PA'O, ,ZHES MKHAS GRUB CHOS KYI RJE DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG RAB DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I YIG CHUNG NYER GCIG LAS BYUNG BA'I MAN NGAG GI YI GE SHIN TU KHUNGS BTZUN PA KHYAD CAN NO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
